creator: tronncarson@hotmail.com

text:
I have tried to reproduce your problem with ant CVS head. I cannot.
Try to run your build in verbose mode. (ant -verbose )
Also if you set quiet="false" and failonerror="true", if the directory ../..
/java/tomcat41/webapps/TestApplet1 cannot be deleted, you will see an error 
message and the build will stop.
Maybe another task within ant is locking the TestApplet1 directory, preventing 
it from being deleted at the time the <delete> task is invoked.
